text: Aaron answered, This day hath been offered the victim for sin, and the holocaust before the Lord, and to me what thou seest has happened. How could I eat it, or please the Lord in the ceremonies, having a sorrowful heart?

segments.text: Aaron answered, This day hath been offered the victim for sin, and the holocaust before
the Lord, and to me what thou seest has happened.
How could I eat it, or please the Lord in the ceremonies, having a sorrowful heart?
